class.rdfs:comment: A chemical or biologic substance, used as a medical therapy, that has a physiological effect on an organism. Here the term drug is used interchangeably with the term medicine although clinical knowledge make a clear difference between them.
class.rdfs:label: Drug

schema:activeIngredient.rdfs:comment: An active ingredient, typically chemical compounds and/or biologic substances.
schema:activeIngredient.rdfs:label: activeIngredient

schema:administrationRoute.rdfs:comment: A route by which this drug may be administered, e.g. 'oral'.
schema:administrationRoute.rdfs:label: administrationRoute

schema:alcoholWarning.rdfs:comment: Any precaution, guidance, contraindication, etc. related to consumption of alcohol while taking this drug.
schema:alcoholWarning.rdfs:label: alcoholWarning

schema:availableStrength.rdfs:comment: An available dosage strength for the drug.
schema:availableStrength.rdfs:label: availableStrength

schema:breastfeedingWarning.rdfs:comment: Any precaution, guidance, contraindication, etc. related to this drug's use by breastfeeding mothers.
schema:breastfeedingWarning.rdfs:label: breastfeedingWarning

schema:clincalPharmacology.rdfs:comment: Description of the absorption and elimination of drugs, including their concentration (pharmacokinetics, pK) and biological effects (pharmacodynamics, pD).
schema:clincalPharmacology.rdfs:label: clincalPharmacology

schema:clinicalPharmacology.rdfs:comment: Description of the absorption and elimination of drugs, including their concentration (pharmacokinetics, pK) and biological effects (pharmacodynamics, pD).
schema:clinicalPharmacology.rdfs:label: clinicalPharmacology

schema:cost.rdfs:comment: Cost per unit of the drug, as reported by the source being tagged.
schema:cost.rdfs:label: cost

schema:dosageForm.rdfs:comment: A dosage form in which this drug/supplement is available, e.g. 'tablet', 'suspension', 'injection'.
schema:dosageForm.rdfs:label: dosageForm

schema:doseSchedule.rdfs:comment: A dosing schedule for the drug for a given population, either observed, recommended, or maximum dose based on the type used.
schema:doseSchedule.rdfs:label: doseSchedule

schema:drugClass.rdfs:comment: The class of drug this belongs to (e.g., statins).
schema:drugClass.rdfs:label: drugClass

schema:drugUnit.rdfs:comment: The unit in which the drug is measured, e.g. '5 mg tablet'.
schema:drugUnit.rdfs:label: drugUnit

schema:foodWarning.rdfs:comment: Any precaution, guidance, contraindication, etc. related to consumption of specific foods while taking this drug.
schema:foodWarning.rdfs:label: foodWarning

schema:interactingDrug.rdfs:comment: Another drug that is known to interact with this drug in a way that impacts the effect of this drug or causes a risk to the patient. Note: disease interactions are typically captured as contraindications.
schema:interactingDrug.rdfs:label: interactingDrug

schema:isAvailableGenerically.rdfs:comment: True if the drug is available in a generic form (regardless of name).
schema:isAvailableGenerically.rdfs:label: isAvailableGenerically

schema:isProprietary.rdfs:comment: True if this item's name is a proprietary/brand name (vs. generic name).
schema:isProprietary.rdfs:label: isProprietary

schema:labelDetails.rdfs:comment: Link to the drug's label details.
schema:labelDetails.rdfs:label: labelDetails

schema:legalStatus.rdfs:comment: The drug or supplement's legal status, including any controlled substance schedules that apply.
schema:legalStatus.rdfs:label: legalStatus

schema:maximumIntake.rdfs:comment: Recommended intake of this supplement for a given population as defined by a specific recommending authority.
schema:maximumIntake.rdfs:label: maximumIntake

schema:mechanismOfAction.rdfs:comment: The specific biochemical interaction through which this drug or supplement produces its pharmacological effect.
schema:mechanismOfAction.rdfs:label: mechanismOfAction

schema:nonProprietaryName.rdfs:comment: The generic name of this drug or supplement.
schema:nonProprietaryName.rdfs:label: nonProprietaryName

schema:overdosage.rdfs:comment: Any information related to overdose on a drug, including signs or symptoms, treatments, contact information for emergency response.
schema:overdosage.rdfs:label: overdosage

schema:pregnancyWarning.rdfs:comment: Any precaution, guidance, contraindication, etc. related to this drug's use during pregnancy.
schema:pregnancyWarning.rdfs:label: pregnancyWarning

schema:prescribingInfo.rdfs:comment: Link to prescribing information for the drug.
schema:prescribingInfo.rdfs:label: prescribingInfo

schema:prescriptionStatus.rdfs:comment: Indicates the status of drug prescription eg. local catalogs classifications or whether the drug is available by prescription or over-the-counter, etc.
schema:prescriptionStatus.rdfs:label: prescriptionStatus

schema:proprietaryName.rdfs:comment: Proprietary name given to the diet plan, typically by its originator or creator.
schema:proprietaryName.rdfs:label: proprietaryName

schema:relatedDrug.rdfs:comment: Any other drug related to this one, for example commonly-prescribed alternatives.
schema:relatedDrug.rdfs:label: relatedDrug

schema:warning.rdfs:comment: Any FDA or other warnings about the drug (text or URL).
schema:warning.rdfs:label: warning
